trans-unit.source: Use mobile app as your contact method with Azure MFA
trans-unit.target: Use mobile app as your contact method with Azure MFA

trans-unit.source: This page will show users how to use the mobile app as the primary contact method for Azure MFA.
trans-unit.target: This page will show users how to use the mobile app as the primary contact method for Azure MFA.

trans-unit.source: Use mobile app as your contact method with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Use mobile app as your contact method with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the mobile app as your primary contact method you can use this article.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use the mobile app as your primary contact method you can use this article.

trans-unit.source: It will walk you through setting up multi-factor authentication to use your mobile app as your primary contact method.
trans-unit.target: It will walk you through setting up multi-factor authentication to use your mobile app as your primary contact method.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Authenticator app is available for <link><linkText>Windows Phone</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>Android</linkText><title></title></link>, and <link><linkText>IOS</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Authenticator app is available for <link><linkText>Windows Phone</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>Android</linkText><title></title></link>, and <link><linkText>IOS</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: To use a mobile app as your contact method
trans-unit.target: To use a mobile app as your contact method

trans-unit.source: Select Mobile App from the drop-down.
trans-unit.target: Select Mobile App from the drop-down.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select either Notification or One-time password and click Set up.
trans-unit.target: Select either Notification or One-time password and click Set up.

trans-unit.source: On the phone that has the Azure Authenticator app installed, launch the app and click scan barcode.
trans-unit.target: On the phone that has the Azure Authenticator app installed, launch the app and click scan barcode.

trans-unit.source: To add an account that already has Azure MFA or a 3rd party account see <link><linkText>Adding an account manually</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To add an account that already has Azure MFA or a 3rd party account see <link><linkText>Adding an account manually</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Scan the barcode picture that came up with the configure mobile app screen.
trans-unit.target: Scan the barcode picture that came up with the configure mobile app screen.

trans-unit.source: Click Done to close the barcode screen.
trans-unit.target: Click Done to close the barcode screen.

trans-unit.source: If you cannot get the barcode to scan you can enter the information manually.
trans-unit.target: If you cannot get the barcode to scan you can enter the information manually.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the phone, it will begin to activate, once this has completed click Contact me.
trans-unit.target: On the phone, it will begin to activate, once this has completed click Contact me.

trans-unit.source: This will send either a notification or a verification code to your phone.
trans-unit.target: This will send either a notification or a verification code to your phone.

trans-unit.source: Click verify.
trans-unit.target: Click verify.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click close.
trans-unit.target: Click close.

trans-unit.source: At this point, your verification should be successful.
trans-unit.target: At this point, your verification should be successful.

trans-unit.source: Now it is recommended that enter your mobile phone number in case you lose access to your mobile app.
trans-unit.target: Now it is recommended that enter your mobile phone number in case you lose access to your mobile app.

trans-unit.source: Specify your country from the drop-down and enter your mobile phone number in the box next to country.
trans-unit.target: Specify your country from the drop-down and enter your mobile phone number in the box next to country.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.
trans-unit.target: Click Next.

trans-unit.source: At this point, you have setup your contact method and now it is time to setup app passwords for non-browser apps such as Outlook 2010 or older.
trans-unit.target: At this point, you have setup your contact method and now it is time to setup app passwords for non-browser apps such as Outlook 2010 or older.

trans-unit.source: If you do not use these apps click Done.
trans-unit.target: If you do not use these apps click Done.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise continue to the next step.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise continue to the next step.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you are using these apps then copy the app password provided and paste the password into your non-browser application.
trans-unit.target: If you are using these apps then copy the app password provided and paste the password into your non-browser application.

trans-unit.source: For steps on individual applications such as Outlook and Lync see How to change the password in your email to the app password and How to change the password in your application to the app password.
trans-unit.target: For steps on individual applications such as Outlook and Lync see How to change the password in your email to the app password and How to change the password in your application to the app password.

trans-unit.source: Click Done.
trans-unit.target: Click Done.

trans-unit.source: Adding an account manually
trans-unit.target: Adding an account manually

trans-unit.source: If you want to add an account manually, select the enter account manually button.
trans-unit.target: If you want to add an account manually, select the enter account manually button.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Now if you have an account that already has Azure MFA, enter the code and the url that is provided on the same page that shows you the barcode.
trans-unit.target: Now if you have an account that already has Azure MFA, enter the code and the url that is provided on the same page that shows you the barcode.

trans-unit.source: This goes in the code and url boxes on the mobile app.
trans-unit.target: This goes in the code and url boxes on the mobile app.

trans-unit.source: This will begin the activation.
trans-unit.target: This will begin the activation.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Once this has completed click Contact me.
trans-unit.target: Once this has completed click Contact me.

trans-unit.source: This will send either a notification or a verification code to your phone.
trans-unit.target: This will send either a notification or a verification code to your phone.

trans-unit.source: Click verify.
trans-unit.target: Click verify.

trans-unit.source: To finish, follow the steps above starting at number 6.
trans-unit.target: To finish, follow the steps above starting at number 6.

trans-unit.source: If you are using a 3rd party account with the mobile app, enter the account name and the security key in the boxes provided and then activate the account.
trans-unit.target: If you are using a 3rd party account with the mobile app, enter the account name and the security key in the boxes provided and then activate the account.

trans-unit.source: Once you have done this and verified the account, follow the steps above starting at number 6.
trans-unit.target: Once you have done this and verified the account, follow the steps above starting at number 6.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you see "Add work account", this is for Workplace Join and not for multi-factor authentication.
trans-unit.target: If you see "Add work account", this is for Workplace Join and not for multi-factor authentication.

trans-unit.source: You can disregard this.
trans-unit.target: You can disregard this.
